title: Run the Night Audit Process
description: The night auditor needs to run the end-of-day process to close the day's business and prepare for the next.

tasks.description: Verify that all departments (e.g., F&B, gift shop) have closed their shifts and submitted their daily totals.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms all departmental reports are in.

tasks.description: Post all remaining room and tax charges to guest folios.
tasks.expected_outcome: All in-house guests have their daily charges posted.

tasks.description: Run the main night audit sequence in the PMS, which closes the current business day and generates summary reports.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit process completes successfully, and the system date rolls over.
